```{r}
library(DataComputing)
```



```{r}
library(readr)
Vgames <- read_csv("~/Downloads/184 project/Video_Game_Sales_as_of_Jan_2017.csv")
View(Vgames)

steam<- read_csv("~/Downloads/184 project/steam-200k.csv")
View(steam)
```

```{r}
head(Vgames)
str(Vgames)

head(steam)
str(steam)

```



```{r}
steamclean <-
  steam %>% 
  select(`The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim`,purchase,`1.0`) %>%
  filter(purchase != "purchase")
```

```{r}

steamVgames <-
  Vgames %>%
  left_join(steamclean, by = c("Name" = "The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim"))

View(steamVgames)
```
